    • Method Detail

      • projectId

        public TranslateOptions.Builder projectId(String projectId)
        Sets project id. Setting a project id has no impact on the Translate service.
        Overrides:
        projectId in class ServiceOptions.Builder<Translate,TranslateRpc,TranslateOptions,TranslateOptions.Builder>
        Returns:
        the builder

      • authCredentials

        public TranslateOptions.Builder authCredentials(AuthCredentials authCredentials)
        Sets the service authentication credentials. Setting credentials has no impact on the Translate service.
        Overrides:
        authCredentials in class ServiceOptions.Builder<Translate,TranslateRpc,TranslateOptions,TranslateOptions.Builder>
        Returns:
        the builder

      • apiKey

        public TranslateOptions.Builder apiKey(String apiKey)
        Sets the API key used to issue requets. If not set, the API key is looked for in the GOOGLE_API_KEY environment variable. For instructions on how to get an API key see Translate quickstart.

      • targetLanguage

        public TranslateOptions.Builder targetLanguage(String targetLanguage)
        Sets the code for the default target language. If not set, english (en) is used. Translate.translate(List, TranslateOption...) and Translate.translate(String, TranslateOption...) calls will use this value unless a Translate.TranslateOption.targetLanguage(String) option is explicitly provided.
        Returns:
        the builder

      • build

        public TranslateOptions build()
        Specified by:
        build in class HttpServiceOptions.Builder<Translate,TranslateRpc,TranslateOptions,TranslateOptions.Builder>
